title: LANKA WATER EXPO
description: Sourced from predicthq.com - We invite you to be a part of a ground-breaking event in the B2B sector of water and wastewater treatment, the Lanka Water Expo, and make it an extraordinary and important experience. We will connect you with the most qualified equipment, and technology providers. Find contingency plans and product procurement options before you need them. You'll also learn about new, emerging water treatment technologies and products to help you prepare for the future.
